A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Truly schizophrenic movie. It has the hints of greatness\, but is weighed down by a padded runtime\, predictability\, slapstick humor\, and superfluous one-dimensional characters whose stories we never get a reason to care about. Like Lukas's in second trilogy\, cute animals\, children and slapstick humor is sprinkled everywhere to make the movie more appealing to children and amenable to merchandising. Star Wars\, Disneyfied.
